briefTitle: Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of a Once-Daily CLS001 Topical Gel Versus Vehicle
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Randomized, Vehicle-Controlled, Double-Blind, Multicenter Study to Evaluate the Safety and Efficacy of a Once-Daily CLS001 Topical Gel Versus Vehicle Administered for 12 Weeks to Subjects With Papulopustular Rosacea With an Open-Label Safety Extension
summary: This study evaluates the safety and efficacy of once-daily application of CLS001 topical gel compared to vehicle gel in subjects with severe papulopustular rosacea.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in Inflammatory Lesion Count From Baseline to Week 12
